title: Decline of Qing, Ottomans and internal conflict

content.prompt: Which of the following contributed significantly to the decline of both the Qing and the Ottoman Empires?

choices.label: Widespread revolts by factory workers and labor unions
Collapse of domestic stock and bond markets
Attempts by the Soviet Union to spread world communism
Internal conflict with ethnic and religious minorities

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
